sourcesContent:
import React, { setValue, Component } from 'react'; import ToggleButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ToggleButtonGroup'; import ToggleButton from 'react-bootstrap/ToggleButton'; import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton' import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown' class Buttons extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { Gender: 1, Orientation: 1, Meeting: null, Name: "", Education: null, School: null, Occupation: null } this.handleText=this.handleText.bind(this) this.handleButton=this.handleButton.bind(this) this.handleDropdown=this.handleDropdown.bind(this) } handleText(event) { const {Name, value}= event.currentTarget this.setState({[Name]: value}) } handleButton(event) { const {Gender, value}= event.currentTarget this.setState({[Gender]: value}) } handleDropdown(event) { const {eventKey, value}= event.currentTarget this.setState({[eventKey]: value}) } render(){ return(
Man Woman

Hetrosexual Bisexual

Hetrosexual Woman Bisexual Woman Both


High School Bachelor Master Doctorate PG Diploma

Dropdown item text School 1 School 2 School 3

Dropdown item text Pro 1 Pro 2 Pro 3

) } } export default Buttons
